column5: Happy Birthday OP! Hope you have a great day, and just know on this subreddit we are all here for one another. Youâ€™re not alone.

Doing 20 crunches won't cut down on your weight that much, if much at all. You'll have to adjust your diet in order to see any major difference. This will help build muscle though, I do suggest building up the amount of crunches you do every 2 hours.
